name: workspace
description: **Mashaaer | مشاعر** is an emotionally intelligent, voice-first AI assistant designed to understand and adapt to each user's unique characteristics. It analyzes tone, word choice, emotional state, and preferred language to create a truly personalized experience. Over time, Mashaaer evolves into a trusted companion, remembering past interactions, learning individual preferences, and responding with appropriate warmth, professionalism, or humor depending on the context.
